name: admin.apps.approved.list
desc: List approved apps for an org or workspace.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 - 1000 both inclusive.

cursor.desc: Set cursor to next_cursor returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

certified.desc: Limit the results to only include certified apps. When false, no certified apps will appear in the result.
